job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Textmetrics offers a highly innovative online service that is already used by many of the larger organizations in the Netherlands. And you as a Senior Python Developer can play an essential role in that!
   Read more
   Apply now
   We are Textmetrics, the innovative AI platform that allows you to generate and optimize texts in a controlled way. This way, all your texts meet your organization's requirements and connect with your target audience. Through our platform we help make organizations more inclusive!

   Our office is located in the center of Arnhem. We are flexible when it comes to working in the office or from home. We are a scale-up, we have already passed the start-up phase and are growing. To help with this growth, we are looking for a senior python developer.

   Are you the person we are looking for?
   We are looking for a senior python developer (male/female/diverse)! We are looking for someone who likes to further develop our innovative software and create new functionalities for customers. You will translate customer needs into new functionality and also develop these functionalities.

   You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications. Furthermore, you have knowledge of object-oriented programming and can work with various databases such as MongoDB and SQL Server.

   Currently, Textmetrics is integrating many generative AI solutions into its software. Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic and NLP is a plus.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Python Developer

Textmetrics offers a highly innovative online service that is already used by many of the larger organizations in the Netherlands. And you as a Senior Python Developer can play an essential role in that!
   Read more
   Apply now
   We are Textmetrics, the innovative AI platform that allows you to generate and optimize texts in a controlled way. This way, all your texts meet your organization's requirements and connect with your target audience. Through our platform we help make organizations more inclusive!

   Our office is located in the center of Arnhem. We are flexible when it comes to working in the office or from home. We are a scale-up, we have already passed the start-up phase and are growing. To help with this growth, we are looking for a senior python developer.

   Are you the person we are looking for?
   We are looking for a senior python developer (male/female/diverse)! We are looking for someone who likes to further develop our innovative software and create new functionalities for customers. You will translate customer needs into new functionality and also develop these functionalities.

   You will be responsible for designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications. Furthermore, you have knowledge of object-oriented programming and can work with various databases such as MongoDB and SQL Server.

   Currently, Textmetrics is integrating many generative AI solutions into its software. Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic and NLP is a plus.

profile_classification.rationale: The role emphasizes developing and integrating generative AI solutions, including experience with LLMs and NLP. While it involves Python development and database work, the core focus is on building functionalities around AI, aligning with the GenAI Engineer profile.

evidence.phrase: translate customer needs into new functionality
evidence.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand customer requirements and translate them into technical features, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

evidence.phrase: allows you to generate and optimize texts in a controlled way
evidence.justification: Understanding the business goal of controlled text generation and optimization is crucial for developing the platform.

evidence.phrase: work with various databases such as MongoDB and SQL Server
evidence.justification: This indicates interaction with and management of data storage systems, which is part of data engineering.

evidence.phrase: integrating many generative AI solutions into its software
evidence.justification: This directly points to the core task of incorporating generative AI models into the product.

evidence.phrase: Experience with various LLMs such as OpenAI, Gemini or Anthropic
evidence.justification: Directly relates to working with and potentially fine-tuning or integrating large language models.
Natural Language Processing is a key area within generative AI modeling.
The primary title of the role, indicating a strong focus on software development using Python.
Implies building upon and enhancing existing software systems.
This involves the development of new features within the software.
Directly states the act of building new features.

evidence.phrase: designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications
evidence.justification: Covers the full lifecycle of software development for Python applications.
A fundamental skill in software development.
Maintenance of applications in production is a key aspect of MLOps.

evidence.phrase: translate customer needs into new functionality
develop our innovative software and create new functionalities
designing, implementing and maintaining high-performance Python applications
